entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Sundre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:21 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sundre Airport 02:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches east of the QE2 Highway. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches east of the QE2 Highway early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:07 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
